Updated because of request. Now supports latest version of Spotify. This project has now merged into SpotifySwitches to allow adding more switches. SpotifyOfflineSwitch will not receive any more updates.

Fixed a bug where flipswitch would not update its current state. If the user now manually the setting, the current state will update. If the app is restarted, the flipswitche will also update.
